author: Mauricio Barbosa
description: Spirituous apple and rich elderflower with herbal dry vermouth and gentian complexity, finished with the merest hint of anise courtesy of a dash of absinthe.
name: Le Sang Jaune (The Yellow Blood)
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain to ice-filled glass
